title: Friend Interface
text: What is the point of adding friends within game only to a.) not be able to tell when they’re online b.) message to plan games c.) communicate outside of games. title: Super great game, needs some bug fixes:/
text: Overall love this game, but ever since the new update there’s been a LOT of bugs. Can’t see who I’m in a lobby with, get game invite requests from friends who aren’t even online every 5 minutes(literally), and frequently get disconnected from the server in the middle of the game. This never happened before the update, so I hope it can get resolved soon:))
